doc.after: Almost all Asian religions have philosophical character and Asian philosophical traditions cover a large spectrum of philosophical thoughts and writings Indian philosophy includes Hindu philosophy and Buddhist philosophy They include elements of nonmaterial pursuits whereas another school of thought from India C rv ka preached the enjoyment of the material world The religions of Hinduism Buddhism Jainism and Sikhism originated in India South Asia In East Asia particularly in China and Japan Confucianism Taoism and Zen Buddhism took shape
